website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive and gorgeously crafted to match her appearance in Frozen, this Anna doll easily fits clothing and accessories made for other popular 12-inch dolls.
pros: 12 inches tall like a standard Barbie

customer_reviews.title: This doll was perfect. For the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doll to use in making my daughter's fourth birthday cake (I make dress cakes). This doll was perfect. For the price, I wasn't expecting anything amazing, but it is a well made doll. The stitching on the clothes was sturdy. The shoes were not the cheap thin plastic I see in a lot of doll shoes. Overall, for the price of the doll, you can't go wring.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as pictured but great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured except that Anna’s eyes are looking to the side and not straight ahead. Besides that I think it’s a pretty good product and you get what you paid for. As it was a doll intended for a 5 year old I didn’t care much about the quality as long as it looked decent enough and it does.
customer_reviews.author: Garoon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: She’s perfect! Same great quality of a Barbie and looks just like Anna. Amazing price for such a popular and beautiful doll.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Byrd

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old has an Elsa doll (given to her by a cousin) and after hours of entertainment with just one doll, we finally brought the sisters back together. This doll is exactly what I would expect for $14 and I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anna anna anna
customer_reviews.text: Anna! My kids LOVE her. Very cute. Looks just like the picture. Hair is adorable and stays. Anything Frozen is a win in this house!
customer_reviews.author: BlbPhx

customer_reviews.title: Good job Prime
customer_reviews.text: I gave my granddaughter an Elsa doll and she then asked for her Elsa's sister. Two days later she was playing with them. Good job Prime.
customer_reviews.author: RbtMartin

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small but nice
customer_reviews.text: I know I know the size is in the description and I should know how big it'll be but still the first impression was it's kinda small. But the daughter finds it perfect size. Nice doll. No features Iike singing, dancing, doing laundry etc) but still good for little ones. It's gift able for someone you like enough to stay friends with but wouldn't mind if they won't call you back ;-) Overall, can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amin C

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value, great doll
customer_reviews.text: A very well-made doll, good presentation, packaging was easy to get into,my daughter was excited that the skirt of the dress with sparkly, I guess the vest and shirt could have been separate, but for the price, and especially for my daughter whose only three and a half, it was perfect! She takes her everywhere, on the swing set, on walks, to bed with her, and she along with her braids have held up the entire time. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Ang Careful

customer_reviews.title: Great doll
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my daughter would have something in theme for the frozen 2 movie... it’s exactly what I expected. The legs and arms don’t bend at the joints, but that’s fine. The doll looks great and as along as it looked remotely close to the character it would have served its purpose. My kid will be working to destroy it between now and the movie release.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Package damaged
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift and my main gripe (reason for 3 stars) is that the package arrived damaged and re-taped even though I purchased new (not used like new). The doll was fine and still intact, so I kept it since most kids don’t really care about the package anyway, unless they can build a fort out of it. My 4 year old loves frozen (surprise) and runs around with the dolls singing “let it go”.
customer_reviews.author: Retro

customer_reviews.title: Disney Frozen Classic Fashion Anna
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Frozen classic Anna doll for my goddaughter also and this one and the Elsa doll came at the same time in a couple of days from the time I ordered them. So my goddaughter got the joy of playing with both dolls and was very happy about this. I will be purchasing more from this seller for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: AD Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Disney Frozen cake
customer_reviews.text: This doll was perfect for making a Disney Frozen cake at home without spending a fortune on it. It is a simple doll that comes with removable black boots. It is also slightly shorter than the Elsa doll; hence, it is true to scale. My daughter has enjoyed playing with both dolls.
customer_reviews.author: vivinguyen17

customer_reviews.title: Anna doll worthy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves frozen and when I gave her the stars she was in love with it good quality worth your money the only thing I was a little disappointed with is the box came slightly damaged other than that everything was awesome
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Really worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For a 8$ doll, the princess is beyond my expectation. My 4 years old daughter loves it. The size is perfect for her. Feels like the quality is not good as my daughter's Elsa, which I bought for 14$. But, it is just a doll. I prefer this 8$ doll, instead of a 14$ doll.
customer_reviews.author: luluxiu

customer_reviews.title: Ana doll
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like picture. Her boots are removable and so far her hair has stayed braided. Unlike a regular rubbery Barbie, she’s made of hard hallow plastic
customer_reviews.author: Daniela G

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Anna
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves her...but she looks like the gotheard puppet from the sound of music movie. Her dress is cute and glittery, but her legs are hollow and she seems very cheaply made. I'm sure there are better choices out there.
customer_reviews.author: CHEF PANTS

customer_reviews.title: Great value/product
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a gift for my niece and she absolutely loved it. Very good quality unlike a lot of dolls that are made with cheap materials. I would recommend for children who love the movie Frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Horner

customer_reviews.title: Not the same doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll I received is not the one advertised. The one I got didn't have a streak in her hair and is looking away for some reason. Her mouth is also crooked, in a sideways smile. It's a decent doll for the price, but it's not the same one in amazon's pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured...
customer_reviews.text: This doll is very cheaply made, but what bothers me is she is looking away. Odd...
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R

customer_reviews.title: looks nice
customer_reviews.text: had a Kohl's price tag sticker on the front, which had a cheaper price listed. probably could've removed that especially if it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: dingdong

customer_reviews.title: Simple Anna Doll
customer_reviews.text: Very simple / basic doll. If you have someone in your life that loves Anna then this is a good basic gift, not sophisticated or showy.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughters 4th birthday. She absolutely loves the movie frozen. She needed Anna to add to her other frozen dolls. The box was a bit smashed when I received it, but that was kind of expected since it was shipped in a shipping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cwil

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves her Anna doll and plays with it everyday. The outfit is from the first Frozen movie but that doesn't bother her at all
customer_reviews.author: Moita

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: The hair is made of plastic and tangles too easily. The legs are made of cheap hard plastic, not like Barbie material.
customer_reviews.author: daradv

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful details
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute doll and my niece loves her. Great details with her freckles and the packaging was so pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: StacyT

customer_reviews.title: NOT new
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this doll as NEW. Extremely embarrassing when it was opened and you could tell it obviously wasn’t new. The package was Scotch taped together.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Cute but messy glitter
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy but I didn't like that the glitter falls off the dress. I'm trying to stay away from loose glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ayala

customer_reviews.title: More super glue.
customer_reviews.text: Anna is overall a cute doll but of my girls want to change her clothes and shoes. The clothes are somewhat ok and can work but her feet are actually two pieces and the toes broke off. More super glue...
customer_reviews.author: joie davis

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: We own about 20 Disney dolls before this one we brought all of them from Disney direct. You can definitely see the inferior product quality in this one. First, this doll wrist and keen do not bend like our other Disney dolls. The cloths are poor quality and very sticky unlike our other dolls. This company should definitely be investigated for fake product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dzung N.

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter just Loved this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been playing with this playful disney character and she is just a great fan.
customer_reviews.author: sahina sultana

customer_reviews.title: Missing the highlight
customer_reviews.text: The only thing it’s missing is the white highlight in her hair other wise it would be pretty perfect. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves Elsa and Anna. She will love playing with this doll.

customer_reviews.title: Same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, looks just like the image online and will be perfect for my daughters Anna cake. It is the same size as a Barbie.
customer_reviews.author: ToriH

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift -very good value. The little girl was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: G.T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Anna Doll
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the Anna doll. This is not cheap and came nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: COURTNEY I

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Daughters favorite , added to her frozen doll collection . Beautiful looking doll
customer_reviews.author: sona

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves his style and it was very inexpensive overall I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is perfect. My daughter uses it with her as a daughter to dance around to the music and she has it saves them she’s practically inseparable from the dolls. The stove is actually a great price and I’m very happy with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valentine J. Mikel

customer_reviews.title: My 3 yo niece loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my niece for her third birthday and she screamed when she opened it 😂. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect! My 3 year old got it for Christmas and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great doll!
customer_reviews.text: It's about the size of a Barbie doll. Daughter loves playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Good quality and cheaper than in the stores. Does contain small pieces like the shoes that come off and won't really stay on once the packing is removed. My daughter loves her!
customer_reviews.author: Riddle me this

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Niece loves it and it's well made for the price
customer_reviews.author: amanda english

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it and it's well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: the most important is that my daughter loves it and also for the price it's well made, it doesn't feel cheap like other reviewers made it seem like
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hampton

customer_reviews.title: I really am not a fan of the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: I really am not a fan of the fact that they don't bend their knees anymore. It makes sitting hard.
customer_reviews.author: M Weber

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This doll is smaller than I expected. My daughter already had an Anna and Elsa doll and this one is slightly smaller. It is smaller than a normal Barbie doll, so if you change the clothes everything is very big.
customer_reviews.author: sarah wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Good to last
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift for my daughter and it looks awesome! Took it out to check quality, hard durable plastic, great sticking on the dress. This doll will definitely last her a long time and she is very hard on her toys!
customer_reviews.author: Derek / Brandy Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this Ana doll, goes well with her Elsa doll... she sleeps with both every night!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice doll
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my granddaughter. She loves it, and it does look very much like the movie character.
customer_reviews.author: Norma E James

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Anna Doll
customer_reviews.text: This Anna doll is so cute! Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: JayPeezie

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: This is for my daughter's birthday next month. She will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought Used....Great Condition
customer_reviews.text: Saved money by purchasing this item used. Was very happy with results. Doll came in new condition, just didn't have box, but that was fine because we opened the doll to put into doll house for my daughter's 5th birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations . Excellent quality . Very realistic. and better than Mattel products Bought three if these so far as gifts for my daughter and nieces
customer_reviews.author: HAITHAM  ABDALLA

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Came just in time before granddaughter’s birthday. She loved it!

customer_reviews.title: The doll is very cheap looking. I found an ...
customer_reviews.text: The doll is very cheap looking. I found an exact one for half the price, try to return it but it cost me more to return it than keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: we bought my Granddaughter the Frozen Mansion for Christmas and I am sure the doll will be a beautiful addition
customer_reviews.text: Anna is charming, we bought my Granddaughter the Frozen Mansion for Christmas and I am sure the doll will be a beautiful addition
customer_reviews.author: marigrace larabee Marigrace Larabee

customer_reviews.title: The girls will love them.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Don't listen to the reviews about being cheap. While I got a good deal they are perfect for little girls.

customer_reviews.title: Nice doll
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a present, it is a really cute doll, the dress is beautiful, I guess a good doll for a Frozen movie girl fan.

customer_reviews.title: Made granddaughter delightfully happy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this doll. The Frozen characters are her favorites.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Doll
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it! My kids love Frozen and at the Add-on cost these made a great St. Nicholas Day gift.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy for that young girl in your life that's obsessed with Frozen!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll! She's very realistic and the dress is of high quality.

customer_reviews.title: ... the quality of the doll itself is not the best. Kids love it though so I suppose thats ...
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than your average barbie doll which leads me to the impression the quality of the doll itself is not the best. Kids love it though so I suppose thats all that matters.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: It Was Exactly Like The Seller Said It Would Be.!

customer_reviews.title: Too much glitter, but cute doll
customer_reviews.text: Love this doll along with the Elsa one! My daughters love them. The only issue is the glitter comes off everywhere. It’s awful. It would be better if the dress didn’t contain glitter.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice Disney doll. Great quality and looks very cute. My daughter loved since the very fist day.

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 star

customer_reviews.title: Great buy

customer_reviews.title: Good doll

customer_reviews.text: The box was destroyed when it arrived. It was a Christmas present so I had to apologize for the looks of it.

product_meta.title: Disney Frozen Classic Fashion Anna
product_meta.description: A free spirit, Anna is fiercely loyal, determined, and courageous. Imagine snowy adventures in Arendelle with this Anna fashion doll from Disney's Frozen. She comes wearing her beautiful travel dress, just like in the movie! Girls will love playing out their favorite scenes, as well as imagining their own adventures with Anna. Copyright Disney Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Doll has movie-inspired features and fashion
Doll comes wearing her travel dress
Includes doll, outfit, and pair of shoes.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,528 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
